name: ダスト
caption: You have two other great Overhead options on this character already, but it's the thought that counts.
notes:
Hitstop on block: 20F
Hitstop on hit: 16F [raw hit: 45F]
Floating crumple: Total 28F (can block 19~28F)

name: 5HS
caption: Yep, you definitely missed that cancel into Behemoth Typhoon

name: 5K
caption: Low Crush
notes:
Retracts lower hurtbox 1-2F, slightly retracts further 3-18F

Staggers on grounded counter hit.
Although the counterhit slowdown and stagger recovery overlap, the slowdown ends before the opponent can begin blocking, so the 25F stagger can be treated as if it were 31F.
Total stagger duration: 31F (1-23F hitstun, 24-31F can block only)
Hitstun duration is increased by 4F for red (normal) recovery, and 8F for blue (slow) and no recovery. (27F and 31F respectively)
Total duration is increased by 5F  for red (normal) recovery, and 10F for blue (slow) and no recovery. (36F and 41F respectively)
Opponents can be thrown while staggered, allowing comboing into throws. During the 'can only block' stage at the end of stagger, the opponent cannot jump to escape throws, meaning there is more time to combo into throws than strikes.
Stagger does not gain 1 additional hitstun on crouching hit, unlike other attacks.

name: 6P
caption: Lend a hand
notes:
Hitbox extends downward on the last three active frames allowing it to hit crouching opponents.
If the first hit of a combo, applies an additional +20 Combo Decay.

name: 近S
notes: Input Proximity Range: 300

name: 遠S
notes: Forward movement occurs on the first active frame

name: jD
caption: The air-based footsies Goldlewis is known for

name: jHS
caption: Have fun figuring out which side this hits

name: ワイルドアサルト
caption: Change the Future
notes: Hitstop: 20F

input: 溜めワイルドアサルト(236[D])
name: 溜めワイルドアサルト
caption: Change the Future
notes: Hitstop: 20F

name: 投げ
notes:
Opponent cannot use Blue Psych Burst on hit or the resulting knockdown.
Builds 1000 Tension once all damage is dealt.
On hit, applies an increased 25 Combo Decay.
Properties change if Roman Canceled before all damage is dealt:
* Reduces positive R.I.S.C. by 25% before applying R.I.S.C. Loss, similar to regular strikes.
* R.I.S.C. Loss: 1000
* Proration: Forced 75%
* Combo Decay on hit: 15
First does two hits of 10 damage, then one final hit of 60 damage.

name: 空投げ
notes:
Air Throws have both normal recovery (which recovers CH) and special recovery frames upon landing (not CH). It is technically possible to recover mid-air from a whiffed Air Throw, but it usually doesn't happen unless done from very high in the air.
Opponent cannot use Blue Psych Burst on hit or the resulting knockdown.
On-Hit value is for attacker's IAD height, except for Potemkin and Nagoriyuki, who have their instant Air Throw height instead.
Frame advantage decreases as height increases (+44 to +54).
Builds 1000 Tension once all damage is dealt.
On hit, applies an increased 25 Combo Decay.
Properties change if Roman Canceled before all damage is dealt:
* Reduces positive R.I.S.C. by 25% before applying R.I.S.C. Loss, similar to regular strikes.
* R.I.S.C. Loss: 1000
* Proration: Forced 75%
* Combo Decay on hit: 15

input: ベヒーモスタイフーン(21478HS)
name: ベヒーモスタイフーン
caption: 'Back'
notes:
Guard Crush duration 35F
Pauses the Security Gauge for 180 frames when Security Cancelled.
Active frames groups: start 3+3+3, midpoint 2+1, ending 1+2
Hitboxes on frames 12-22 side switch the opponent on hit, hitboxes on frames 23-25 launch the opponent straight up
Horizontal Activation Range: 200 (Frames 15-24 only). Functionally, cannot hit opponents extending a hurtbox through Goldlewis from a distance.

caption: Go my child, and hold down the neutral.

Vertical Activation Range: 200 (All Levels)
Security Level is reset on frame 21 (All Levels)

Drone disappears if Goldlewis is hit (All Levels)

name: Skyfish
caption: Mowing down health and meter like no other
notes:
Data in [] represents on-hit value for bullets 25-50. Data in {} represents on-hit value on the final 51st bullet.
While each bullet is fired individually, the attack will only check the input every 3 bullets, making it usually fire in sets of 3.
Security gauge first drains on Frame 25, and again every 3 frames when each bullet is fired.
Vertical Activation Range: 0 (from projectile's height of 200). Unable to hit extended air-to-ground hurtboxes.
Pauses the Security Gauge for 180 frames after all bullets have disappeared (approximately 220F total).

input: ベヒーモスタイフーン(89632HS)
name: ベヒーモスタイフーン
caption: 'Fast Overhead'
notes:
Guard Crush duration 35F
Pauses the Security Gauge for 180 frames when Security Cancelled.
Active frames groups: start 3+3+3, midpoint 2+1, ending 1+2
Usually hits on frame 21 against standing opponents
If the opponent is Giovanna and she is in a neutral standing state this move hits on frame 23 instead, but her proximity guard animation raises her hurtbox such that the 4th set of active frames will connect. This has no known practical consequences, but one of the notable quirks is it gives Giovanna a more generous window to IB this move in situations where she can return to her neutral standing state

input: ダウン・ウィズ・ザ・システム(1080P)
name: ダウン・ウィズ・ザ・システム
caption: More Circles = More DamageLand a clean hit for even more power!
notes:
reversal
Data in [] represents values on Clean Hit.
The attack is made up of multiple seperate hits and does not behave as a single multi-hit attack:
* The total R.I.S.C. Loss is unaffected, however positive R.I.S.C. is reduced by 25% 4 times in total.
* All hits made by sources other than the first one to connect will be scaled by the added R.I.S.C.
* Attack only deals the maximum damage from at least 1068 R.I.S.C. (approx. 8.3% gauge) as a result.
